report.title: Occurrence record counts by year
report.description: Lists years and the number of records for each.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM websites w JOIN surveys su on su.website_id=w.id LEFT JOIN (samples s JOIN occurrences o on o.sample_id=s.id AND o.deleted='f' ) on s.survey_id=su.id LEFT JOIN (occurrence_attribute_values oav JOIN termlists_terms certainty ON certainty.id=oav.int_value ) ON oav.occurrence_id=o.id AND oav.deleted='f' AND oav.occurrence_attribute_id=#certainattr# #joins# WHERE w.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (o.zero_abundance='f' OR o.id IS NULL) AND (CAST(su.id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND ( (o.record_status='V') OR ('#quality#'='C' AND certainty.sort_order<=#maxcertain#) OR ('#quality#'='L' AND certainty.sort_order<=#maxlikely#) OR ('#quality#'='!D' AND o.record_status<>'D') OR ('#quality#'='!R') ) AND o.record_status<>'R'

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: certainattr
param.description: Select the attribute which defines certainty. This must be a lookup, where the term sort order defines the order of certainty (most certain first).

param.name: maxcertain
param.description: Maximum sort order for certainty attribute terms that counts as certain

param.name: maxlikely
param.description: Maximum sort order for for certainty attribute terms that counts as likely
